name: Interplanetary Voyager
description:
A little arcade-type shooter made for the #GBJam! 

Traverse the solar system (or part of it at least), blasting asteroids and aliens out of the sky! But be careful not to hit any satellites or probes! 

Controls:

Move = Arrows

Shoot (when possible) = Space

Will definitely be adding an arcade mode since I ran out of time putting this part of the game together!
